name: I DARE You to Take My Candy
name_original: I DARE You to Take My Candy
description:
UCI VGDC Proto Gam Jam Submission!

Play as John, the 43 year old single fast food worker. He is just trying to enjoy his night from a terrible day, but monsters won't leave him alone! They want his candy! Help John protect his candy from the monsters.

Team Contributions:

Daniel Boghossian: Audio Designer, Programmer

Trevor Vahan: Gameplay Designer, Programmer

Hasan (Soni) Rakipi: Artist

Justin Banh: Artist

Emily Avey: UI/UX

Brandon Chan: Playtestor

Axel: Emotional Support
